channel.title: Darkfall Online (Not your average shit mmorpg)
channel.description:
http://www.darkfallonline.com
Game released but launch has failed miserably due to Aventurine being lazy. Nevertheless, i'm in and gameplay is fucking great.

item.title: Darkfall Online (Not your average shit mmorpg)
item.dc:creator: @slayer215 slayer215
item.description:
@slayer215 wrote:

[quote=“Speljohan, post:11, topic:244927”]K so i’m in da game now, i’m positively surprised, all the bullshit about it sucking on forums is ridiculous. I’ve enjoyed every single minute i’ve been playing this game.

I give this game 5 out of 5 cocks![/quote]

You whore, I havent been able to get home in time to order it all week. You better enjoy it

item.title: Darkfall Online (Not your average shit mmorpg)
item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

I haven’t had a chance to play it yet, but now that more information is available I can more confidently say it looks like I suspected, a rich world for people who like fucking around in pointless rich worlds rather than playing games.

The second life of MMOs.

I still look forward to playing it and confirming my suspicions though.

I’ve looked in to dark fall a bit and it doesn’t seem to impress me. I will surely try it out though.
